mapper.select: SELECT tcm.user_id, tcm.nickname, tcm.created_time FROM T_Calendars_Members tcm LEFT JOIN T_Members tm ON tcm.user_id = tm.user_id WHERE tcm.team_id = #{teamId} AND tcm.calendar_id = #{calendarId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_calendars_members (calendar_id, user_id, team_id, nickname) VALUES (#{calendarId}, #{userId}, #{teamId}, #{nickname})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_calendars_members WHERE calendar_id = #{calendarId} AND user_id = #{userId} and team_id = #{teamId}
